Posts.Content: I am a new member of CancerCompas and i would like to receive more informations about breast cancer. I am a cancer survivor with stage III-B diagnosis. I underwent total mastectomy last september, 2002, had finished 6 cycles of chemo therapy then had radiation. As of now, I am on arimedex. I just want to meet or hear from other cancer survivors most especially their experiences and also advises on foods which I am not supposed to take. Any topic regarding breast cancer will interest me. I will be happy to receive more informations and meet new friends through this.
Posts.Title: New Member
